review: Actually he was a very good and very good listener. First of all he got out all the information and then suggested for the surgery and he is actually good at explaining clearly like what is happening, what all complications are there he was very much clear about the treatment, and it gave me full resonate to know about the problem my dad was facing. I usually visit other hospitals. It's been his first visit to him. Wait time can be improved in the hospital and am not happy with the experience of operation people in hospital most of people they don’t care about the patient and don't treat normally it happens all the times, when we visit they will tell doctor is not available you have to wait for 2hours there is not visibility when he is coming, all the time you ask about the doctor they will tell doctor is in operation so am not really happy with the hospital operations *** *** ********* *** **** ****** *** **** ***** I am happy to meet Dr. Suneel in Medicover Hospitals.

I went to the doctor and the patient was one of my friend. He had knee pain. I took appointment. ******** *** ****** ********* ** ******* He prescribed X-ray and few medicines. It was related to joint problem. Its solved now after medication. He had a knee problem actually. I am satisfied with the treatment given. There was 30 minutes waiting time to consult the doctor. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.
Did not liked the experience. DOCTOR WAS IN HURRY TO CALL NEXT PATIENTS THAN HEARING US.Not recommended visit another doctor

* ****** **** **** ****** ***** ** ********** *** ****** He didn’t even check where the pain was in my foot. Only thing he did was get me an X ray ( which was too costly around Rs.600) and give some Vitamin D.

Although so came at the right time, the wait was long around 45 minutes.

I visited the hospital as I had a ligament tissue breakage problem. In December I went for MRI scanning. Treatment and hospitality was good. The doctor explained in detail about the health issue and he spoke very friendly. Waiting time was there as appointment was at 11.30 am but he came at 1 pm as the doctor was busy in operation. He told to do MRI scanning. I am satisfied with given treatment. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends

Doctor prescribed medicine which is helpful and he explained very well about the issue and suggested it very well. I went to hospital for knee problem treatment and I am happy with the doctor treatment. I would like to give a rating of 8/10 to the hospital and the appointment timing happened on time and there was normal waiting time to consult the doctor.

He was very approachable and he knew what was the issue whatever medicines or consultation he recommended it was useful. It was a random search on practo based on reviews we visited him. I am happy with the medicines he suggested. I will recommend the doctor to my family and friends. The wait time was a little bit too much. We had to wait for 20-25min and I think the existing patient took a lot of time. He did give time for the consultation and also makes patients comfortable to talk openly.
Very nice and knowledgeable doctor advised the necessary precautions and prescribed required medicines
Explained the remedy for the issue and gave proper guidance. Also provided feedback for further consultation.
Pls spare some more time to listen patient problems. And for staff please be friendly and helpful for patients who is asking some information
